nodes.text: This jewel shop was a pawn shop specializing in jewels and other gems, located in the city of Darlyn Boda on the Outer Rim Territories planet of Darlyn Boda.

The bounty hunter 4-LOM first embarked upon a career devoted to crime after jumping ship from his assignment aboard the luxury liner Kuari Princess at Darlyn Boda, before consigning the stolen Ankarres Sapphire to the jewel shop. 4-LOM returned to the shop years later to purchase the sapphire back.
